nodes.text: The Sher Kars were the predominant ruling species on Mustafar.

They were huge, scorpion-like beasts which mostly inhabited the deepest part of the Tulrus Nesting Grounds, as the Tulrus was the Sher Kar's prey of choice. Malfosa was the most famous Sher Kar, and had killed many people before being killed on the Burning Plains. There were three types of Sher Kar on Mustafar. Blackguard Elite Minions would have to kill one of these creatures to advance to the rank of Wilder.

Sher Kar appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
